inclusion.criterion: Histologically confirmed adenocarcinoma of the prostate, previously untreated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: PTT, INR, AST, ALT, creatinine, total bilirubin within normal limits
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Prior hormone, radiation, or chemotherapy for prostate cancer
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients receiving therapeutic doses of warfarin or heparin
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients who otherwise would not be candidates for radical prostatectomy because of health or tumour factors
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Prior malignancy unless the prior malignancy was diagnosed and definitively treated at least five years previously and there has never been any evidence of recurrence.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Other serious illness, psychiatric, or medical condition that would not permit the patient to be managed according to the protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient is a candidate for urethral catheterization and TURP. He has a history of acute urinary retention in the past 2 days.
